Class NacMediaFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.nfcalarmclock.mediapicker.NacMediaFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NacMusicFragment, NacRingtoneFragment

    public class NacMediaFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Media fragment for ringtones and music files.

      • safePlay

        protected int safePlay(android.net.Uri contentUri,
                       boolean repeat)
        Play audio from the media player safely.
        Parameters:
        contentUri - The Uri of the content to play.
        repeat - Whether the media player should repeat the media or not.
